message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of significant value to you. While I can't disclose the specifics of the product just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $1750000. This is a price that reflects both the value of the product and the opportunity it presents. I understand this is a significant investment, and I'm confident it will be a profitable one for you. If you're interested, I'd be happy to discuss further details and answer any questions you may have.
